entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Little Grand Rapids
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this afternoon. Wind becoming southeast 30 km/h early this afternoon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 11 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h near noon. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning and minus 23 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Monday 13 February 2023
